category: Member Sports Group Regulations/Article 17 (Processing of Urgent Affairs)
contents: Article 17 (Processing of Urgent Affairs) ① If the head of a member sports organization deems the content to be minor or urgent, he/she may execute it, and shall report this to the next board of directors for approval. ② If the head of a member sports organization deems that the content to be presented at the meeting is minor or urgent, he or she may substitute a resolution of the Board of Directors with a written resolution. However, when the majority of registered directors request to formally refer the matter to the board of directors, this must be followed.
